title: 'The Sellout' Is A Profane Riff On Race And Culture
teaser: In Paul Beatty's new satirical novel, The Sellout, the narrator wants to re-segregate his hometown outside of Los Angeles. NPR's Scott Simon talks to the author about using humor to write about race.
